get.summary: Gets the contents of a path.

parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The search term.  Optional.

parameters.name: nodeType
parameters.description: The node type of results, either folder, document, or both.  Optional.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The specified path to retrieve contents for.

createdBy.description: The creator of this folder or document.

createdDate.description: The date this folder or document was created.

description.description: The description of the folder or document.

docType.description: The type of the document. This cannot be changed.

externalId.description: The third party ID used to uniquely reference data

fileName.description: The name of the folder or document with no extension.

id.description: The ID of the folder or document.

isFolder.description: Boolean indicating if the Child is a Folder (if true) or a Document (if false)

metadata.description: Simple metadata describing the document. Must be a valid JSON map with non-blank keys. Values can only be non-blank strings or arrays of non-blank strings.

mimeType.description: The mime type if this is a document.

path.description: The file path of the folder or document.

size.description: For folders, the hierarchical count of children under this Node if it is a Folder. For documents, the count of bytes.

updatedDate.description: The date this folder or document was last updated.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

children.description: List of Child folders for this folder.

libraryPath.description: The library path of the folder.

path.description: The file path of the folder.

children.description: All of the folders and documents contained in this folder

childrenPagingInfo.description: The page number, page size, and total number of children.

createdBy.description: The creator of this folder or document.

createdDate.description: The date this folder or document was created.

description.description: The description of the folder or document.

docType.description: The type of the document if this is a document.

externalId.description: The third party ID used to uniquely reference data

fileName.description: The name of the folder or document with no extension.

id.description: The ID of the folder or document.

isFolder.description: Boolean indicating if the Child is a Folder (if true) or a Document (if false)

metadata.description: Simple metadata describing the document if this is a document.

mimeType.description: The mime type if this is a document.

path.description: The file path of the folder or document.

size.description: For folders, the hierarchical count of children under this Node if it is a Folder. For documents, the count of bytes.

updatedDate.description: The date this folder or document was last updated.

versionId.description: The ID of the version if this is a document.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements
